S04bsu037_u:1_0: evaṃ mayā śrutamekasmin samaye potalakaparvate āryāvalokiteśvarāyatane divyamaṇiratnaśrīindranīlamaye
S04bsu037_u:1_1: puṣpasaṃstṛte devasiṃhāsane bhagavān sārdhaṃ mahatā bhikṣusaṅghena pañcamātrairbhikṣuśataiḥ
S04bsu037_u:1_4: śatajātibhirvā pratibaddhaiḥ sarvaiḥ aṣṭaphalaprāptairdaśabhūmisthitaiḥ tad yathā
S04bsu037_u:1_6: candanena amṛtaketunā evaṃpramukhaiḥ saptaśataiḥ bodhisattvaiḥ sārdham upāsakopāsikābhiḥ
S04bsu037_u:1_7: sarvaiśca vyākṛtaiḥ samādhiprāptaiḥ nānālokadhātubhiḥ sannipatitaiḥ pañcasahasraiḥ
S04bsu037_u:2_1: vyākaraṇaprāptābhiravaivartikābhiḥ anaupamyayā vimalaprabhayā ca prabhāvatyā bhīmaśriyā
S04bsu037_u:4_0: atha taiḥ sarvaistathāgataṃ siṃhāsananiṣaṇṇaṃ jñātvā svakasvakaiḥ kuśalamūlaistathāgataṃ
S04bsu037_u:5: tena khalu punaḥ samayena bhagavān sarvasattvamahākaruṇājñānasthitaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpanno 'bhūt /
S04bsu037_u:6: tena samādhidhāraṇabalena trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātavaḥ ābhayā avabhāsitā abhūvan /
S04bsu037_u:8: ye ca sattvā jātyandhāḥ cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi paśyanti sma /
S04bsu037_u:15: sattvānāṃ yaḥ khalu dhanavastubhogavihīna āsīt sa dhanavastubhogasampanno 'bhūt /
S04bsu037_u:17: trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātau ye kecit sattvā anuśāsanadharmaśravaṇāya yena bhagavān tenāṃjaliṃ praṇamya upasaṃkrāntāḥ /
S04bsu037_u:18: ye sattvāḥ [Dutt_50] devabhūtāste sarvadevasukhaṃ saṃprahāya buddhānusmṛtiṃ kṛtvā dharmaśravaṇāya yena bhagavān tena upasaṃkrāntāḥ /
S04bsu037_u:19: ye sattvā manuṣyabhūtāste ca manuṣyasukhaṃ parityajya dharmaśravaṇakāmāya yena bhagavāṃstena upasaṃkrāntāḥ /
S04bsu037_u:20: ye sattvā nāgayakṣarākṣasapretapiśācabhūtāste buddhānusmṛtiṃ prāpya sarvasattveṣu maitracittā bhūtvā kāyacittasukhaṃ labdhvā dharmaśravaṇāya yena bhagavān tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ /
S04bsu037_u:21: ye sattvā yamaloke andhatamisrāyāṃ jātāste 'pi buddhānubhāvena ekakṣaṇaṃ smṛtiṃ labdhvā parasparaṃ saṃjānate sma /
S04bsu037_u:25: tena khalu samayena mahāpṛthivī ṣaḍ vikāraṃ prakampate unnamati avanamati sma /
S04bsu037_u:26: atha tasyāṃ parṣadi maṃjuśrīkumārabhūtaḥ sanniṣaṇṇaḥ san bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamāryāvalokiteśvarametadavocat /
S04bsu037_u:27: kulaputra mahābodhisattvaparṣadi avabhāsitāyāṃ mahāparṣadaḥ pūrvanimittaṃ parisphuṭam /
S04bsu037_u:30: kulaputra anekānāṃ ca bodhisattvakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ sarvāśāparipūri mahājñānapratilambho bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu037_u:31: tat kulaputra sattvānāṃ kāruṇyamutpādya hitāya sukhāya yāvadanuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpanāya tathāgataṃ paripṛccha /
S04bsu037_u:32_0: santi kulaputra sattvāḥ paścime kāle paścime samaye bhaviṣyanti pāpakāriṇo daridrāḥ
S04bsu037_u:32_1: kṛśā durvarṇaśarīrā jarāvyādhiparipīḍitāḥ parīttabhogā aparibhāvitakāyā alpāyuṣkā
S04bsu037_u:33_0: teṣāmarthāya kulaputra tathāgatamadhyeṣaya dharmadeśanāyai tat te kṛtaṃ bhaviṣyati
S04bsu037_u:33_1: dīrgharātraṃ sattvānā[marthāya] hitāya sukhāya sarvāvyādhipraśamanāya sarvapāpanivāraṇāya
S04bsu037_u:37_1: kurvan yena bhagavāṃstenāṃjaliṃ praṇamya triḥpradakṣiṇīkṛtya paṃcamaṇḍalena praṇipatya
S04bsu037_u:38_0: santi bhagavan sattvāḥ paścime kāle bhaviṣyanti jarāvyādhiśokamṛtyu[duḥkha]kālamṛtyuparipīḍitāḥ
S04bsu037_u:38_1: kṛśā durvarṇā alpāyuṣkāḥ parīttabhogā aparibhāvitakāyāste parasparāṇi mātsaryadauḥśīlyacittatayā
S04bsu037_u:40: tat teṣāmahaṃ bhagavan arthāya hitāya sarvāśāparipūrarṇārthaṃ yāvat tathāgatajñānāharaṇārthaṃ buddhakṣetropapattaye sarvapāpanivāraṇārthaṃ tathāgatamadhyeṣyāmi /
S04bsu037_u:41: bhāṣasva bhagavan bhāṣasva sugato nāsti tathāgatasya tajjñānaṃ yadaviditam adṛṣṭam aśrutam avijñātameva /
S04bsu037_u:42_1: samāgatā dharmasāṃkathyaṃ śrotukāmāḥ pūrvabuddhaparyupāsitāḥ saprajñā jātāḥ te nirāśībhūtā prakramiṣyanti /
S04bsu037_u:43: atha te sarve yathā samāgatāḥ parṣat paṃcamaṇḍalena praṇipatya ekakaṇṭhena evamāhuḥ /
S04bsu037_u:44: sādhu bhagavan bhāṣasva bhagavan bhāṣasva sugataḥ /
S04bsu037_u:45: [Dutt_52] atha bhagavān dvirapi trirapi adhyeṣaṇāṃ viditvā daśadiśamavalokya valgumaṇojñasvareṇāryāvalokiteśvaraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat /
S04bsu037_u:46: asti kulaputra sarvatathāgatādhiṣṭhānsattvāvalokanabuddhakṣetrasandarśanavyūho nāma samādhiḥ yo mayā pūrvaṃ prathamacittotpādamupādāya śrutaḥ /
S04bsu037_u:48: tat sahaśravaṇādeva tasya samādhernāmadheyasya navatīnāṃ sattvakoṭīnāṃ tathāgatajñānapratilambho 'bhūt /
S04bsu037_u:51: tat smarāmyahaṃ kulaputra divyena tathāgatajñānena triṃśatyā tathāgatasahasrairayaṃ dharmaparyāyo bhāṣitaḥ sattvānāmarthāya /
S04bsu037_u:53: ayaṃ ca yathā samāgatā sarvabodhisattvānāṃ parṣad bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikā parṣad[ete sarve]śrutvā mānanāṃ pūjanāṃ kurvanti sma /
S04bsu037_u:56_0: sarvakāmaṃ gatāḥ kṛtasarvāśāḥ samṛdhyante vigatavyādhayaḥ saṃvṛttā paripakvakuśalamūlāḥ
S04bsu037_u:56_3: prajñāvantaḥ buddhe dhama saṃghe abhedyaprasādena samanvāgatā dhṛtimantaḥ āyurvarṇatejobalarathāmavantaḥ
S04bsu037_u:57: na ca kadācit priyaviprayogaṃ na priyavyasanaṃ saṃvṛttam /
S04bsu037_u:58: evaṃ kulaputra bahuguṇasasanvāgatāste kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaraśca bhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu037_u:59_1: samalaṃkṛtya namo buddhāyeti kṛtvā namaskariṣyanti sādhukāraṃ dāsyanti dhārayiṣyanti
S04bsu037_u:59_2: vācayiṣyanti vācāpayiṣyanti likhiṣyanti likhāpayiṣyanti paramagauravaṃ cittamutpādya
S04bsu037_u:59_3: tasya dharmabhāṇakasyāntike te dṛṣṭa eva dharme sarvasaguṇasamanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti
S04bsu037_u:59_4: abhirūpāḥ prāsādikā darśanīyā vigatavyādhayo dīrghāyuṣkāḥ sthirabuddhayaḥ smṛtimantaḥ
S04bsu037_u:59_5: dhṛtimantaḥ sarvarājānāṃ sarvarājñīnāṃ rājaputrāmātyānāṃ sarvaśatrūṇāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ
S04bsu037_u:64: sarvāvaraṇaṃ cāsya kṣayaṃ cāsyanti paṃcānantaryaprabhṛtayaḥ kṛtvā /
S04bsu037_u:67: na īrṣyāluko na vikṣepacittaṃ kālaṃ kariṣyati /
S04bsu037_u:68: yāvaccyutaḥ sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāvupapadyate vyākṛtāste mayā kulaputra saṃmukhavyākaraṇena /
S04bsu037_u:71: bodhau ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayiṣyanti satkṛtya likhiṣyanti likhāpayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti pūjayiṣyanti udgrahīṣyanti nāmadheyaṃ ca
S04bsu037_u:72: śroṣyanti / bodhisattva iti sa manasi kṛtvā satkartavyaḥ /
S04bsu037_u:73_0: yenāsya pūvakarmavipākenāsya rūpavaikalyaṃ bhogavaikalyaṃ buddhivaikalyaṃ paribhāṣyaṃ
S04bsu037_u:73_1: ca priyaviprayogaṃ ca rājyakṣobhaṃ ca te asya samādheranubhāvena śravaṇena kecicchīrṣarogeṇa
S04bsu037_u:73_2: kecidbhaktacchedena kecit kucelābhidhāraṇena kecit kāyacittapīḍena kecit duḥkhasaṃsparśaśayyākalpanena
S04bsu037_u:73_3: kecit paribhāṣyeṇa sarvaṃ tat karmāvaraṇaṃ kṣayaṃ yāsyanti /
S04bsu037_u:74: tena cavaṃ cittamutpādayitavyaṃ pūrvaṃ mayā saṃsāre saṃsaradbhiḥ pāpamakuśalaṃ sattveṣu nānāprakāramupacitaṃ taṃ pratideśayāmi āviṣkaromi na praticchādayāmi /
S04bsu037_u:76_0: yeca tasya kulaputrasya kuluduhiturvā chedabhogaphalaṃ saṃvartanīyaṃ [Dutt_55] karmāvaraṇaṃ
S04bsu037_u:76_1: bhaviṣyati buddhe vā dharme vā saṃghe vā śrāvakapratyekabuddhe vā mātāpitṛbhirvā
S04bsu037_u:78_0: ye ca tasya kulaputrasya ca kuladuhiturvā duḥkhanārakavedanīyaṃ karmāvaraṇaṃ bhaviṣyati
S04bsu037_u:78_2: īrṣyāmānakrodhavaśena yamalokapretatiryagyonisaṃvartanīyaṃ tat sarvaṃ parikṣayaṃ yāsyati /
S04bsu037_u:82_3: yāvadvyākaraṇapratilaṃbhakarāṇi dhāraṇīmantrapadāni yāni śrutvā dhāritvā vācitvā
S04bsu037_u:83: sa te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaraśca sarvānetān guṇān pratilabhante /
S04bsu037_u:84: atha tasmin samaye iyaṃ mahāpṛthivī ṣaḍvikāramakaṃpata /
S04bsu037_u:85: sā ca yathā samāgatā parṣat tathāgataṃ puṣpadhūpagandhamālyaduṣyayugaiḥ saṃcchādya sādhukāramadāt /
S04bsu037_u:86: sādhu sādhu bhagavan katamāni tāni mantrapadāni /
S04bsu037_u:90: sarvaśāparipūraṇe dyutindhare narake ca pūjite tathāgatajñānadade tathāgatādhiṣṭhāne ca /
S04bsu037_u:96_0: imāni tāni kulaputrāho mantrapadāni triṃśatyā tathāgatasahasrairbhāṣitāni adhiṣṭhitāni
S04bsu037_u:96_1: mayāpyetarhi bhāṣitā[ni] sarvasattvānāmarthāya hitāya sukhāya rakṣāvaraṇaguptaye
S04bsu037_u:97_0: yaḥ kaścit parṣa evaṃ jānīyuḥ kathaṃ nu vayaṃ sarvānetān tathāgatabhāṣitān guṇān
S04bsu037_u:97_1: pratilabheya tena kalyamevotthāya sarvasattvānāṃ dayācittena karūṇācittena maitracittena
S04bsu037_u:97_2: īrṣyāmānamrakṣakrodhaparivarjitena ekāgracittena buddhasyodāratarāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā daśadiśaṃ
S04bsu037_u:97_3: sarvatathāgatānāṃ namaskṛtvā yathākāmaṃ guṇān manasikṛtya aṣṭaśataṃ japya puṣpamekaikaṃ tathāgate deyam /
S04bsu037_u:105: [Dutt_57] asyāṃ khalu punardhāraṇyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ ṣaṣṭīnāṃ ca prāṇisahasrāṇāmanutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntipratilaṃbho 'bhūt /
S04bsu037_u:106: sarve ca sarva[karmā] varaṇavinirmuktāḥ sarvābhiprāyaparipūrṇāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ /
S04bsu037_u:109: atha khalu vajrapāṇirbodhisattvo daśadiśaṃ vyavalokya bhagavantametadavocat /
S04bsu037_u:110: asti bhagavan abhayatejaṃ nāma dhāraṇī bodhisattvānāṃ pratijñā yā mayā abhayavyūharājasya tathāgatasyāntikādudgṛhītā /
S04bsu037_u:112_0: tataḥ punaḥ bhagavan nābhijānābhi yasya svapne 'pi sā dhāraṇī karṇapuṭe nipatitāntargatā
S04bsu037_u:112_1: tasya syāccharīre daurbalyaṃ vā kleśo vā vyādhirvā jvaro vā kāyaśūlaṃ vā cittapīḍā
S04bsu037_u:112_2: vā akālamṛtyurvā udakaṃ vā śastraṃ vā viṣaṃ vā garaṃ vā ḍākinī vā bhūto vā yakṣo
S04bsu037_u:112_3: vā śatravo vā manuṣyā vāmanuṣyā vā viheṭhaṃ vā kartuṃ hiṃsāṃ vā vidhātuṃ vā nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate /
S04bsu037_u:114: teṣāṃ dharmabhāṇakānāṃ dharmaśrāvaṇikānāmarthāya śrotṝṇāṃ mānayitṝṇāṃ pūjayitṝṇāṃ dhārayitṝṇāṃ vācayitṝṇāṃ sarvāśāparipūrakarāṇi /
S04bsu037_u:117: tadyathā om vajradhara vajradhara vajrakāya vajrabala vajrateja /
S04bsu037_u:131: asyāṃ dhāraṇyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyām iyaṃ mahāpṛthivī unmajjanimajjanaṃ karotu /
S04bsu037_u:132: sarve ca yakṣarākṣasāḥ saṃbhrāntāḥ sarve ca devā yāvad manuṣyāmanuṣyā vismayamāpannāḥ sādhukāraṃ pradadati /
S04bsu037_u:133: sādhu sādhu mahāsattvāḥ paramasiddhāni imāni dhāraṇīmantrapadāni bhāṣitāni /
S04bsu037_u:135_0: yaḥ kaścid bhadanta bhagavan bodhisattvabhūmimabhiprārthayate dhanadhānyabhogaiśvaryaṃ
S04bsu037_u:135_1: rājyaṃ vidyādharatvam āyurbalavīryadīrghāyuṣkatvaṃ tena śuklāṣṭamyāṃ śvetacandanamayo
S04bsu037_u:137: sadhātukaṃ vajra[dharaṃ] samāśvāsakaṃ vidyādharaṃ dhūpadahyamānaṃ śucinā ahorātroṣitena kāryam /
S04bsu037_u:138: tato 'ṣṭamyāṃ pūrvasecaṃ [Dutt_59] kṛtvā śuce satathāgatasthāne mahatā dhūpapuṣpagandhadīpaiḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā triskṛtvā aṣṭaśatiko jāpo dātavyaḥ tathāgatasya pūjā kartavyā /
S04bsu037_u:139_0: sarvatathāgatānāṃ namaskṛtya catvāri pūrṇakumbhā[ni]sthāpya raktacandanamayaṃ maṇḍalaṃ
S04bsu037_u:139_1: kṛtvā śvetavastrāprāvṛtena ekāgramānasena caturdiśe ca rasagandhamadyapāyasavaliṃ
S04bsu037_u:140: yāvat pañcadaśī tato mahānirghoṣo bhaviṣyati pṛthivīkampaśca raśmayo niścariṣyanti /
S04bsu037_u:148: sādhu sādhu vajrapāṇe anatikramaṇīyā iyaṃ mudrā /
S04bsu037_u:149: nātra kāṃkṣā na vimatirna vicikitsā kartavyā sadevakena lokena /
S04bsu037_u:155: sarvatathāgatānāmadhiṣṭhānaṃ [Dutt_60] sarvabodhisattvānām adhiṣṭhitaśca sarvasamādhiṃ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni pratilabhate /
S04bsu037_u:157: devānāṃ nāgānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ yakṣāṇāṃ gandharvāṇāṃ pretānāṃ tiryagyonigatānāṃ yāmalaukikānām amī sattvāḥ puṇyopagāḥ sukṛtakarā buddhadharmasaṃgheṣu prasādaṃ pratilabhante /
S04bsu037_u:159: teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ pāpadṛṣṭigatānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati sarvapāpebhyo nivārayati /
S04bsu037_u:162: te ca sattvā buddhadharmasaṃgheṣu prasādaṃ pratilabhya buddhakṣetreṣupapadyante /
S04bsu037_u:169: duṣkaraṃ ca bhagavan arhattvaṃ prāgevānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ /
S04bsu037_u:171_3: puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ parebhyaḥ saṃprakāśanīyaḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ teṣāṃ ca dharmabhāṇakānāṃ
S04bsu037_u:171_4: pūjanasatkaraṇapuṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ tasyāyaṃ pūrvimakaḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ śatatamāmapi kalāṃ nopaiti /
S04bsu037_u:172: yaśca mayā kulaputra dharmo bhāṣitaḥ paryāvāptaḥ taṃ sarvaṃ satkare gurukare mānaye pūjaye satkṛtya likhaye likhāpaye /
S04bsu037_u:173: yaścāyaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ likhe vācaye pūjaye saṃprakāśaye bahutaram itaḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāraṃ parigrahīṣyati /
S04bsu037_u:177_0: te ca sattvāḥ pāpasamācārāḥ khādyapeyahāsyanāṭyābhiratā aśubhe śubhasaṃjñinaḥ kāmakrodhavyāpādabahulā
S04bsu037_u:177_1: asukhe sukhasaṃjñinaḥ prahārākrośatarjanatāḍanābhiratā na jñāsyanti na manasi kariṣyanti /
S04bsu037_u:178: te tataḥ pāpakarmanidānājñānā akalyāṇamitraparigṛhītā jarāvyādhiśokamṛtyuparipīḍitā maraṇakāle paritarpyante /
S04bsu037_u:179: śmaśānasadṛśamaṃcāvalaṃvyamānaṃ parasparaṃ paśyanti na ca kuśalacittamutpādayiṣyanti nābhedyaprasādam /
S04bsu037_u:181_1: mānayituṃ pūjayitum udgrahītuṃ na likhituṃ na likhāpayituṃ na śraddhadhātuṃ na ca
S04bsu037_u:181_2: tān dharmabhāṇakān satkartuṃ mānayituṃ pūjayitum [api na śakyate /
S04bsu037_u:182: ] tathāgatakṛtyaṃ kulaputra tatra viṣaye bhaviṣyati yatrāyaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ pracariṣyati /
S04bsu037_u:183: atha sā yathā samāgatā parṣat sādhukāramadāt /
S04bsu037_u:185: vayamapi bhagavan dharmabhāṇakaṃ dharmaśrāvaṇikaṃ tathāgatakṛtyena satkariṣyāmaḥ gurūkariṣyāmaḥ mānayiṣyāmaḥ sarvasukhopadhānaṃ cāsyopasaṃhariṣyāmaḥ /
S04bsu037_u:186: ayaṃ ca dharmaparyāyaṃ vaistarikīkariṣyāmaḥ rakṣiṣyāmaḥ yenāyaṃ dharmaparyāyaściraśtitiko bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu037_u:187: atha bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāṃ yathā samāgatāṃ parṣadamavalokyaivamāhuḥ /
S04bsu037_u:190: kāyacittanirapekṣairbhūtvā sarvopaplavanaparibhavanaparibhāṣaṇatarjanaprahārākrośalabhyamānam [api] imaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ śrāvayitavyo likhitavyo vācayitavyaḥ /
S04bsu037_u:191: taṃ ca dharmabhāṇakaṃ dharmaśrāvaṇikaṃ sarvasukhopadhānena copasthātavyaḥ /
S04bsu037_u:192: sa ca viṣayaḥ sa ca dvīpaḥ sa ca nagaro rakṣitavyaḥ sarvabhayopadravopasargopāyāsebhyaḥ /
S04bsu037_u:193: tasya ca kulaputrasya kuladuhiturvā satatasamitaṃ samanvāhartavyam /

S04bsu037_u:452_0: yo 'smābhiḥ śrutam apathagāmināṃ pathamupadarśayati anarthe arthasaṃjñinām anitye
S04bsu037_u:454: mahākṛtyena tathāgatakṛtyena imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ prakāśitam /
S04bsu037_u:456_0: ayaṃ ca kulaputra dharmaparyāyaḥ paścime kāle paścime samaye dakṣiṇāpathe pracariṣyati
S04bsu037_u:457_0: sa ce uttarapūrvapaścimāyāṃ pracare tat parakarmābhiyuktāste sattvā bhaviṣyanti na
S04bsu037_u:457_1: śroṣyanti śraddhāsyanti na pattīṣyanti na pūjayiṣyanti hīnavīryanaṣṭasmṛtayo nānāvyākṣepakuṭambadāsadāsībhogaiśvaryahāsyalāsyanāṭyanṛtyagīterṣyāmātsaryasmṛtayo
S04bsu037_u:457_2: na śroṣyanti na pattīṣyanti napūjayiṣyanti te aparimuktā eva jarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsebhya
S04bsu037_u:458_0: tasmāttarhi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhirvā sarvāpāyairātmānaṃ parimoktukāmena
S04bsu037_u:458_1: satkṛtya ayaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ pūjayitavyo dhārayitavyaḥ satkartavyaḥ parebhyaḥ saṃprakāśatitavyo
S04bsu037_u:459_1: imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ pūjayitvā vācayitavyaḥ dhvaje vā ucchrapitaṃ kṛtvā pūjayitvā
S04bsu037_u:460: caturdiśe baliṃ īttvābhinamaskṛtya puṣpadhūpagandhaiḥ sarva ityupadravāḥ praśamaṃ yāsyanti /
S04bsu037_u:462: atha bhagavān tasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata /
S04bsu037_u:463: Stav_1 [sarvasya sattvasya anugrahārthaṃ] yā bhāṣitā pūrvabhaveṣu nāyakaiḥ /
S04bsu037_u:464: [ahaṃ tathā tvāmapi deśayiṣye] gṛṇhāhi ānanda imaṃ samādhim //
S04bsu037_u:465: yaścaiva traidhātukadānu dadyā saptāna ratnāna ca pūrayitvā /
S04bsu037_u:466: Stav_2 yaścaiva traidhātukadānu dadyā saptāna ratnāna ca pūrayitvā /
S04bsu037_u:468: buddheṣu dharmeṣu sadāpramattaḥ upamāpi tasya na sa bhonti dānam //
S04bsu037_u:470: yaścaiva sūtraṃ[ca] dhareti kaści ayaṃ tato bahutaru puṇyu bheṣyate //
S04bsu037_u:471: Stav_4 yaścāpi ekaṃ kṣipayeta puṣpaṃ vastraṃ ca mālyaṃ ca vilepanaṃ tathā /
S04bsu037_u:472: imaṃ samādhiṃ ca[ya] satkareta nāyaṃ tato bahutaru puṇyu bhoti //
S04bsu037_u:473: Stav_5 yaścāpi kārṣāpaṇu dānu dadyā imasya sūtrasya ca pūjanārtham /
S04bsu037_u:474: janitvā bodhāya ca maitracitte ayaṃ tato bahutaru puṇyu prāpnuyā //
S04bsu037_u:475: Stav_6 yaścāpi sattveṣu imaṃ samādhiṃ prakāśaye deśayi bodhisattvaḥ /
S04bsu037_u:476: pratipādaye bodhimanuttare tathā upamāpi puṇyaṃpi na tasya bhoti //
S04bsu037_u:477: imaṃ ca śrutvā tatha ānuśaṃsāḥ kṛtvā ca maitraṃ tatha sarvasattvaiḥ /
S04bsu037_u:478: Stav_7 imaṃ ca śrutvā tatha ānuśaṃsāḥ kṛtvā ca maitraṃ tatha sarvasattvaiḥ /
S04bsu037_u:480: tasmāpi sūtram imu dhārayeta likheta vāceta tathā prakāśaye //
S04bsu037_u:482: upapadyamānā narakeṣu pretayo mā paścakāle parītāpyu bheṣyatha //
S04bsu037_u:484: kosmābhi trāṇaṃ bhavate parāyaṇaṃ mukhe mukhaṃ prekṣati bālabuddhiḥ //
S04bsu037_u:485: Stav_10 [yasmā tathāgatamabhipūjayitvā] bauddhaṃ ca dharmaṃ tatha sāṃghikañca /
S04bsu037_u:486: hariṣya neṣye yamaloki dāruṇe na tasya trāṇaṃ sada kaści bheṣyati //
S04bsu037_u:487: Stav_11 na putradāraṃ na ca mitrabāndhavān na cāpi rāṣṭraṃ na ca hāsyalāsyam /
S04bsu037_u:488: dhanaṃ na dhānyaṃ na ca vastrabhūṣaṇaṃ sarvaṃ jahitvā puna duḥkhadāruṇam //
S04bsu037_u:489: imaṃ samādhiṃ na ca śraddadhitvā tathā[ca duḥkhaṃ]dāruṇaṃ vedayate /
S04bsu037_u:490: Stav_12 imaṃ samādhiṃ na ca śraddadhitvā tathā[ca duḥkhaṃ]dāruṇaṃ vedayate /
S04bsu037_u:492: ima duḥkhu śrutvā imu ānuśaṃsāḥ ko bālabuddhirna jane prasādam //
S04bsu037_u:493: Stav_13 tasmācca tairhi sada bhikṣubhikṣuṇī upāsakopāsikarājabhiḥ sadā /
S04bsu037_u:494: imaṃ ca sūtraṃ sada dhārayitvā satkāru nityaṃ ca kartavyadhārake //
S04bsu037_u:496: udgṛhītaṃ mayā bhagavan imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śāstṛsaṃjñayā dhārayiṣyāmi pūjayiṣyāmi sarvasattvebhyaḥ saṃprakāśayiṣyāmi /
S04bsu037_u:498_0: yadi tvamānanda yanmayā dharmo bhāṣitaḥ śruto dhārayituṃ tat sarvaṃ na dhāraye na
S04bsu037_u:498_1: vācaye na pūjaye na vaistārikīkuryā tvayā mama nāparādhye na cāśuśrūṣā kṛtā bhave na cāśrāvakatvam /
S04bsu037_u:499: yaśca imaṃ dharmaparyāya na dhāraye [Dutt_87] na vācaye na pūjaye na saṃprakāśaye na manasikuryā sa mām aparādhye aśuśrūṣā kṛtā bhave aśrāvakatvaṃ bhave /
S04bsu037_u:500: tasmāttarhi tvamānanda satkṛtya ayaṃ dharmaparyāyo dhārayitavyaḥ /
S04bsu037_u:501: ayaṃ te tathāgatasyānuttarasamyaksaṃbodhatathāgatakṛtyaṃ kariṣyati paścime kāle paścime samaye sarvasattvānām /
S04bsu037_u:502: asmin khalu punardharmaparyāye bhagavatā bhāṣyamāṇe ṣaṣṭīnāṃ prāṇisahasrāṇāmanupādāyāsravebhyaścittāni vimuktāni saptānāṃ śatānāṃ bodhisattvasamādhipratilaṃbho 'bhūt /
S04bsu037_u:506: ayaṃ bhagavan dharmaparyāyaḥ paścimakāle paścimasamaye teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ śrotṝṇāṃ dhārayitṝṇāṃ mānayitṝṇāṃ teṣāṃ ca lekhakānāṃ tathāgatakṛtyaṃ kariṣyati /
S04bsu037_u:508_0: ye ca sattvāḥ paścime kāle paścime[sama]ye hāsyanāṭyagītavāditeṣu nānāvyākṣepabahulā
S04bsu037_u:508_2: na pūjayiṣyanti na mānayiṣyanti na śraddhāsyanti na pattīyiṣyanti na dhārayiṣyanti
S04bsu037_u:509: te taṃ pūrvakarmaśubhaphalaṃ parikṣepaṃ kṛtvā nānāduḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ [Dutt_88] nārakaṃ duḥkhamanubhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu037_u:511: dīrgharātramakalyāṇamitravaśāḥ paścānutāpino bhaviṣyanti imaṃ kṣaṇaṃ virāgayitvā /
S04bsu037_u:513: buddhadharmasaṃghe[a]bhedyaprasādena sarvasattveṣu maitracittena īrṣyāmātsaryadauḥśīlyacittaparivarjitena krodhaparivarjitena bhavitavyam /
S04bsu037_u:514: atha sā yathāsamāgatā parṣa taistaiḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāraiḥ tathāgataṃ pūjayati sma /
S04bsu037_u:516: tad yathā sādhu sādhu bhagavan subhāṣitamidaṃ mahādharmaparyāyaṃ sarvasattvānāmarthāya tathāgataśāsanacirasthityartham /
S04bsu037_u:518: kiṃnāmāyaṃ bhagavan dharmaparyāyaḥ kathaṃ ca vayaṃ bhagavan dhārayāmaḥ /
S04bsu037_u:520: tasmāttarhi tvamānanda imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ sarvatathāgatajñānabodhisattvabhūmikramaṇamityapi nāma dhāraya /
S04bsu037_u:524_1: sarve ca mahāśrāvakāḥ sarve ca śakrabrahmalokapālāścatvāraśca [Dutt_89] mahārājā
S04bsu037_u:525: sā ca sarvāvatī parṣayathāsamāgatā bhagavato bhāṣitamabhinandya[sādhukāramadāt /
